# gx-canvas-cell

A cell for the [gx-canvas](../canvas/readme.md) component

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                       | Type                            | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `accessibleRole` | `accessible-role` | Specifies the semantics of the control. Specifying the Role allows assistive technologies to give information about how to use the control to the user.           | `"listitem"`                    | `undefined` |
| `align`          | `align`           | Defines the horizontal alignment of the content of the cell.                                                                                                      | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"` | `undefined` |
| `left`           | `left`            | Defines the left position of the control which is relative to the position of its `gx-canvas` container. This attribute maps directly to the `left` CSS property. | `string`                        | `"0px"`     |
| `maxHeight`      | `max-height`      | This attribute defines the maximum height of the cell.                                                                                                            | `string`                        | `null`      |
| `minHeight`      | `min-height`      | This attribute defines the minimum height of the cell.                                                                                                            | `string`                        | `"100%"`    |
| `top`            | `top`             | Defines the top position of the control which is relative to the position of its `gx-canvas` container. This attribute maps directly to the `top` CSS property.   | `string`                        | `"0px"`     |
| `valign`         | `valign`          | Defines the vertical alignment of the content of the cell.                                                                                                        | `"bottom" \| "middle" \| "top"` | `undefined` |
| `width`          | `width`           | This attribute lets you specify the width of the control.                                                                                                         | `string`                        | `"100%"`    |
